author: abhih1
body:
#### PR description:
This PR changes the timing windows and removes a chi-square constraint to make DQM more useful during splash events. This is not meant to be merged into CMSSW. 
This is a forward port of the PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35734 in the production version to keep it in sync with master
title: (Splash only) Special timing plot configuration for splash events master
